item.description:
Ultimate Billiards Pool and LIVE Music Party with Shaded Soul

Join Central CT Singles For A Great Night of Pool, Dancing and LIVE Music!

Ultimate Billiards is a giant nightclub with Live Music, over 25 Pool Tables, Ping Pong, Air Hockey, Darts, and a full bar and menu - and great LIVE Music!

They are easy to find -located directly off of the Berlin Turnpike in the Ocean State Plaza across from Berlin Showcase Cinemas.

Ultimate Billiards
151 Webster Square Road
Berlin, CT 06037
(860) 828-7721


Meet Local Singles and have FUN!

Don't play pool? Come on over and listen to the band and keep the guys from getting lonely!

Drink Specials for Central CT Singles Group Members

Live Motown, Dance and Soul Music from Shaded Soul

Tickets are only $15 at the Party and includes $5 Cover Charge, $5 Pool Table Fee,
Drink Specials for Central CT Singles Group, and ALL Games

ONLINE SPECIAL: $12 Tickets Online

FREE POOL All Night
FREE Pool Lessons For Beginners
FREE LIVE Band
FREE Darts
FREE Air Hockey
FREE Ping Pong
Prizes and Surprises
Have Fun And Meet Local Singles


All age groups are welcome!


More Singles = More Fun

- so print this certificate, bring it to the next Central CT Singles Event and you will:
Receive a half-price ticket with the purchase of 1 ticket or
Receive 1 FREE ticket with the purchase of 2 tickets

Visit http://www.CentralCTS... and print your More Fun Certificate

or Click Here



See you at the party!
Jason
Central CT Singles
Membership is FREE, Join The Party And Meet Local Singles
(860) 236-3343

Receive our New Events Email - Click Here


UPCOMING EVENTS:


Fri Feb 8 @ 7 pm Dinner and Music at LaBoca Mexican Restaurant with the CTNites.com VIP Club LaBoca, Middletown, CT


Thu Feb 14 @ 8 pm The CT Dating Game on Valentines Day Bachelors and
Bachelorettes Wanted Georges II Restaurant, Wallingford


Thu Feb 21 @ 7:30 CT Theatre Group Event -The Little Dog Laughed -Click For Info TheaterWorks Hartford, CT


Sat Feb 23 @ 8 pm The Extreme Neon Bowling Party With 1 FREE Game + Shoes And Half-Price Games AMF/Players Lounge E. Hartford


Thus Feb 28 @ 7 pm Dinner and Comedy Night at John Harvard's Restaurant and Brew House John Harvards, Manchester
